formulas.title: Kinematics Equations
formulas.highlight: v = u + at  |  s = ut + ½at²  |  v² = u² + 2as
formulas.content: Valid only for constant acceleration (a).

formulas.title: Projectile Motion
formulas.content: Range (R) is max at θ = 45°. Time of flight T = (2u sin θ) / g.
formulas.tip: Complementary angles (θ and 90-θ) have the same Range.

formulas.title: Work-Energy Theorem
formulas.content: Work done by all forces (conservative + non-conservative) equals change in Kinetic Energy.

formulas.title: Center of Mass
formulas.content: Weighted average position of mass.
formulas.tip: For continuous bodies, use ∫ r dm / ∫ dm.

formulas.title: Moment of Inertia
formulas.highlight: Ring: MR² | Disc: MR²/2 | Solid Sphere: 2/5 MR²
formulas.content: Resistance to rotational motion.

formulas.title: Gravitational Potential Energy
formulas.content: Potential energy at distance r from center.

formulas.title: Escape Velocity
formulas.content: Minimum potential to escape gravitational field.
formulas.tip: Independent of the mass of the projectile.

formulas.title: Simple Harmonic Motion (Energy)
formulas.content: Total energy in SHM is constant.

formulas.title: Doppler Effect
formulas.content: Observer moving towards source: numerator +

formulas.title: Young's Modulus
formulas.content: Stress / Strain within elastic limit.
formulas.tip: Steel is more elastic than rubber.

formulas.title: Bernoulli's Principle
formulas.content: Conservation of energy for flowing fluids.

formulas.title: Coulomb's Law
formulas.content: Force between two point charges. k = 9×10⁹.
formulas.tip: Force is along the line joining centers.

formulas.title: Capacitance (Parallel Plate)
formulas.content: With dielectric K: C' = Kε₀A / d

formulas.title: Ohm's Law & Power
formulas.content: Voltage drop across resistor.
formulas.tip: For series, P ∝ R. For parallel, P ∝ 1/R.

formulas.title: Magnetic Field (Circular Loop)
formulas.content: Field at center of current carrying loop.
formulas.tip: Use Right Hand Thumb Rule for direction.

formulas.title: Lorentz Force
formulas.content: Force on moving charge in magnetic field.
formulas.tip: Force is perpendicular to both v and B.

formulas.title: LCR Circuit Resonance
formulas.content: Condition where X_L = X_C (Inductive = Capacitive reactance).
formulas.tip: Impedance Z is minimum (Z=R) at resonance.

formulas.title: Lens Maker's Formula
formulas.content: Focal length of a lens depends on refractive index and curvature.

formulas.title: Photoelectric Equation
formulas.content: hν is photon energy, Φ is work function.
formulas.tip: Slope of V_stopping vs frequency graph is h/e.

formulas.title: Bohr Model (Energy)
formulas.content: Energy levels of Hydrogen-like atoms.
formulas.tip: Energy becomes less negative (increases) as n increases.

formulas.title: Molarity (M)
formulas.content: Moles of solute per Litre of solution.

formulas.title: Bohr Radius
formulas.content: Radius of nth orbit for H-like species.

formulas.title: Bond Order
formulas.content: Bonding electrons - Antibonding electrons.
formulas.tip: Higher B.O. = Higher Stability, Shorter Bond Length.

formulas.title: Ideal Gas Equation
formulas.content: Universal Gas Law. R = 0.0821 L atm / mol K or 8.314 J / mol K.
formulas.tip: Check units of Pressure and Volume.

formulas.title: Root Mean Square Speed
formulas.content: Speed of gas molecules. M is molar mass in kg.

formulas.title: First Law of Thermodynamics
formulas.content: Conservation of energy. Sign convention: q (heat given), w (work on system) is positive.

formulas.title: Gibbs Free Energy
formulas.content: Spontaneity condition: ΔG < 0 is spontaneous.

formulas.title: pH of Buffer (Henderson)
formulas.content: For acidic buffer.
formulas.tip: For basic buffer: pOH = pKb + log([Salt]/[Base]).

formulas.title: Work Done (Isothermal Rev)
formulas.content: Maximum work done by gas in expansion.

formulas.title: Nernst Equation
formulas.content: Cell potential at non-standard conditions.

formulas.title: Faraday's First Law
formulas.content: Mass deposited in electrolysis. Z = Equivalent Wt / 96500.

formulas.title: First Order Kinetics
formulas.content: Rate constant equation.
formulas.tip: Half life t½ = 0.693/k (Independent of initial conc).

formulas.title: Arrhenius Equation
formulas.content: Temperature dependence of rate constant.

formulas.title: Osmotic Pressure
formulas.content: Colligative property. i is Van't Hoff factor.
formulas.tip: Best for polymer molar mass determination.

formulas.title: Bragg's Law
formulas.content: X-ray diffraction in crystals.

formulas.title: Spin Magnetic Moment
formulas.content: n is number of unpaired electrons.

formulas.title: Effective Atomic Number
formulas.content: Stability of coordination compounds.
formulas.tip: Stable if EAN = Next noble gas Z.

formulas.title: Aldol Condensation
formulas.content: Aldehydes/Ketones with dilute base form β-hydroxy aldehyde.

formulas.title: Test for Unsaturation
formulas.content: Decolorizes Red-Brown Bromine or Pink KMnO4.
formulas.tip: Alkenes and Alkynes give positive test.

formulas.title: Hinsberg Reagent
formulas.content: Distinguishes 1°, 2°, 3° amines.
formulas.tip: 1° soluble in alkali, 2° insoluble, 3° no reaction.

formulas.title: Quadratic Roots
formulas.content: Sum α+β = -b/a, Product αβ = c/a.

formulas.title: AP Sum
formulas.content: Sum of first n terms of AP.

formulas.title: GP Sum (Infinite)
formulas.content: Valid only when |r| < 1.

formulas.title: Log Properties
formulas.content: log(a^b) = b log a.
formulas.tip: Change of base: log_b(a) = log a / log b.

formulas.title: Complex Cube Roots
formulas.content: Roots of unity. ω = (-1 + i√3)/2.

formulas.title: Distance of Point to Line
formulas.content: Perpendicular distance from point (x₁, y₁) to ax+by+c=0.

formulas.title: Circle Tangent Condition
formulas.content: Line y = mx + c is tangent to x² + y² = a².

formulas.title: Parabola Parametric
formulas.content: General point on y² = 4ax.
formulas.tip: Tangent at 't' is ty = x + at².

formulas.title: Ellipse Eccentricity
formulas.content: For standard ellipse (a > b).

formulas.title: Standard Limits
formulas.tip: L'Hospital Rule: Differentiate num and den if 0/0 form.

formulas.title: Chain Rule
formulas.content: Derivative of composite functions.

formulas.title: Integration by Parts
formulas.highlight: ∫ u v dx = u ∫ v dx - ∫ (u' ∫ v dx) dx
formulas.content: Order of u choice: ILATE.

formulas.title: King's Property
formulas.highlight: ∫(a to b) f(x) = ∫(a to b) f(a+b-x)
formulas.content: Most useful definite integral property.

formulas.title: Area Under Curve
formulas.content: Area bounded by curve and x-axis.
formulas.tip: Subtract lower curve area from upper curve.

formulas.title: Vector Dot Product
formulas.content: Scalar product. Zero if vectors perpendicular.

formulas.title: Vector Cross Product
formulas.content: Vector perpendicular to both a and b.

formulas.title: 3D Plane Equation
formulas.content: Normal vector n = (a, b, c).

formulas.title: Bayes Theorem
formulas.content: Probability of cause given effect.
formulas.tip: Total Probability P(B) is sum of all cases.

formulas.title: Variance
formulas.content: Variance = Mean of squares - Square of mean.

formulas.title: Angle Between Lines
formulas.content: Angle between two straight lines.
